bill_title: make an appropriation for gas well cleanup in Harding County.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to make an appropriation for gas well cleanup in Harding County. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the regulated substance response fund established under § 34A-12-3 the sum of one million dollars ($1,000,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, for the purpose of gas well cleanup in Harding County. Section 2. The sums appropriated in section 1 of this Act may be expended solely for purposes of gas well cleanup in Harding County. Section 3. The treasurer shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
